result.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا
result.translation: (89) And We have certainly diversified for the people in this Qur’ān from every [kind of] example, but most of the people refused except disbelief.
